thread.title: David Castro
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by David Castro

author: David Castro
title: David Castro
text:
Freeze Pro had the best value quality brand Avalanche kits (beacon, probe and shovel) online, believe me I had scoured the internet. I have bought previously from the US (just beacons) and the price I paid was over what Freeze Pro listed. Postage from the Scotland was great value (only $9.50 AUD) and quick! I ordered on Monday and received the package on Thursday morning. I could track the package all the way from Edinburgh to Melbourne. I hope I never have to use the avalanche kits, but having this equipment gives me some security when we now go trekking in the back country.
I will definitely recommend Freeze Pro to my family and friends!
